subject: Re: [junit] Re: Assert for files
msgSnippet: ... What are you looking for?  I ll be writing an assert that compares two files in the next day or two.  If this is all you re looking for, I can contribute
messageBody:
> This is something else I get asked for all the time. Sure would be nice
> if someone coded all this up...

What are you looking for? I'll be writing an assert that compares two
files in the next day or two. If this is all you're looking for, I can
contribute it if you like.

Later,
Dale
